name: Robby Rewind
description:
Robby Rewind - Submission for Brackeys GameJam: "REWIND".

------------------------------

How to Play:

 Arrows -> Move

Space->Jump + Walljump

Aim: Reach the Rewind Buttons. But Attention! Its not a rewind button if there would be no reason ;)

-----------------------------

Made with Unity, Affinity Designer, Garageband.

If you're interested in the making of (+ tools I've used) I will upload a video about it. Consider following here or on YouTube: Arrain Games.
